|zh                 = 
;今天是烟绯的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''烟绯：''' 嗯…清淡爽口、口感鲜嫩，还冒着腾腾热气。
:'''烟绯：''' 这顿饭完美符合「豆腐律法」，我给它一百分！
:'''派蒙：''' 嘿嘿，符合你口味就好！
:'''烟绯：''' 作为回报，这是各国律法资料！
:'''烟绯：''' 下次见面时我还可以赠送一次免费的普法课程哟～

;Today is [[Yanfei]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Yanfei:''' Mmm... Light and refreshing, with a fresh and tender texture. There's even hot steam rising from it.

:'''Yanfei:''' In return, here is information on the laws of various countries!

|dialogue_review_en = This meal is in perfect accordance with the "Laws of Tofu", I give it one-hundred marks!
